template:
Create a unit test for the text_editor diff_edit command.

The diff_edit command should:
1. Accept a file path, start_line, end_line, and file_text
2. Replace the lines from start_line to end_line (inclusive) with the new file_text
3. Handle edge cases appropriately (file doesn't exist, invalid line numbers)
4. Save history for undo functionality

Your test should verify these behaviors.

{{additional_info}}

arguments.name: additional_info
arguments.description: Any additional information or specific test scenarios
